snippet: The head of an association that watches over memorials to German resistance fighters says a document indicates that Heinrich Müller was killed and eventually buried in a mass grave in the heart of the German capital.
abstract: Prof Johannes Tuchel, head of association that watches over memorials to German resistance fighters, claims to have found a document indicating that Heinrich Muller, chief of Hitler's Gestapo who escaped capture, was killed and buried in a mass grave in a Jewish cemetery in Berlin; claim is credible enough to stir a mixture of sorrow, outrage and shock in the city and beyond.
lead_paragraph: The head of an association that watches over memorials to German resistance fighters says a document indicates that Heinrich Müller was killed and eventually buried in a mass grave in the heart of the German capital.

headline.main: Müller, an Architect of the Holocaust, Is Said to Be Buried in a Jewish Cemetery in Berlin
headline.print_headline: Architect of Holocaust, Never Found, Is Said To Be in Jewish Cemetery
